      • GhostManager

        public GhostManager(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)

    • Method Detail

      • clearMembers

        public void clearMembers()
        Remove all existing player members and ghosts.

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Add the given player to this ghost manager. This ensures that it can see ghosts, and later become one.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player to add to the ghost manager.

      • isGhost

        public boolean isGhost(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Determine if the given player is tracked by this ghost manager and is a ghost.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player to test.
        Returns:
        TRUE if it is, FALSE otherwise.

      • hasPlayer

        public boolean hasPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Determine if the current player is tracked by this ghost manager, or is a ghost.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player to check.
        Returns:
        TRUE if it is, FALSE otherwise.

      • setGhost

        public void setGhost(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
            boolean isGhost)
        Set wheter or not a given player is a ghost.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player to set as a ghost.
        isGhost - - TRUE to make the given player into a ghost, FALSE otherwise.

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Remove the given player from the manager, turning it back into the living and making it unable to see ghosts.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player to remove from the ghost manager.

      • getGhosts

        public org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer[] getGhosts()
        Retrieve every ghost currently tracked by this manager.
        Returns:
        Every tracked ghost.

      • getMembers

        public org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer[] getMembers()
        Retrieve every ghost and every player that can see ghosts.
        Returns:
        Every ghost or every observer.

      • close

        public void close()

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
